string.description: Lets the user know that the time unit being changed is hour. Appears on the top of the TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=8]
string.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_hour

string.description: Lets the user know that the time unit being changed is minute. Appears on the top of the TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=8]
string.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_minute

string.description: Lets the user know that the time unit being changed is second. Appears on the top of the TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=8]
string.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_second

plurals.description: Content description of the current number of hours being selected in TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
plurals.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_hours_content_description

plurals.description: Content description of the current number of hours being selected in TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
plurals.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_minutes_content_description

plurals.description: Content description of the current number of hours being selected in TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
plurals.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_seconds_content_description

string.description: Content description of the period picker in TimePickerWith12HourClock. It lets the user select the period for 12H time format. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_period

string.description: Lets the user know that this picker is to change the value of the day date unit. Appears on the DatePicker component, on top of the day picker. [CHAR_LIMIT=8]
string.name: wear_m3c_date_picker_day

string.description: Lets the user know that this picker is to change the value of the month date unit. Appears on the DatePicker component, on top of the month picker. [CHAR_LIMIT=8]
string.name: wear_m3c_date_picker_month

string.description: Lets the user know that this picker is to change the value of the year date unit. Appears on the DatePicker component, on top of the year picker. [CHAR_LIMIT=8]
string.name: wear_m3c_date_picker_year

string.description: Content description of the confirm button of DatePicker and TimePicker components. It lets the user confirm the date or time selected. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: wear_m3c_picker_confirm_button_content_description

string.description: Content description of the next button of DatePicker and TimePicker components. It lets the user to move to the next picker. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: wear_m3c_picker_next_button_content_description

string.description: Content description of the decrease button of Slider components. It lets the user decrease value of the slider. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: wear_m3c_slider_decrease_content_description

string.description: Content description of the increase button of Slider components. It lets the user increase value of the slider. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: wear_m3c_slider_increase_content_description

string.description: A message which is used to indicate that an action failed in a FailureConfirmation [CHAR_LIMIT=12]
string.name: wear_m3c_confirmation_failure_message

string.description: A message which is used to indicate that an action succeeded in a SuccessConfirmation [CHAR_LIMIT=12]
string.name: wear_m3c_confirmation_success_message

string.description: A message which is used to indicate than the user should continue their action on their phone, used in OpenOnPhone component [CHAR_LIMIT=12]
string.name: wear_m3c_open_on_phone
